response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, but its true worth lies in the hands of someone like yourself who can appreciate and utilize it to its fullest potential. Given its immense value to you, we propose a fair transaction at $12,500. This price reflects the balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your anticipated benefit from it. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to achieve their goals. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12500}
